topBar.location: Fixed on the top of the page
topBar.description: A flex container placed at the top of the page

menuButton.description: A menu button with a menu icon that toggles the MenuBar when clicked

form.description: A form containing a search input and a button with an icon, both placed inside a label

Tooltip1.description: A tooltip containing a switch component

Tooltip2.description: A tooltip containing a button with an icon that toggles fullscreen mode when clicked

Dropdown1.description: A dropdown menu activated by a button with an icon, showing four icons and text when hovered over

Dropdown2.description: A dropdown menu activated by a button with an icon, showing a heading, a button, three anchor elements, and text when hovered over

Dropdown3.description: A dropdown menu activated by a button with an avatar, showing a heading, text, and three anchor elements with icons and text when hovered over

MenuBar.description: A container with sub-menus and avatar

Menu Items.location: Just below Avatar seperated by horizontal line
Menu Items.description: List of menu items containing sub-menu of their own

Menu Details.location: Below every list item in menuBar, hidden initially
Menu Details.description: Sub menu items are accordions that are visible when clicked on menu item in menuBar

MenuBar.children_orientation_description: Menu deatils are accordions where all items are in list format

ExtrasSortable.location: Main content area of the page
ExtrasSortable.description: Component displaying sortable lists with different styles

Breadcrumb.location: At the top of the component
Breadcrumb.description: Breadcrumb navigation indicating the current page location

props.listData: Array of items representing the sortable list data
props.setListData: Function to update the state of the sortable list data
props.styleType: Type of the sortable list style

functionality.sidebar_toggle: a toggle feature that allows the sidebar to be hidden or shown along with resizing to show only icons
